CSSPrimitiveValueGetStringValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The getStringValue() method of the
interface is used to get a string value. If this CSS
value doesn't contain a string value, a is raised.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:
